name: 'Shirt'
description: 'A shirt is a piece of clothing worn on the upper part of your body with a collar

name: 'T-shirt'
description: 'T-shirt has short sleeves and a round neckline

name: 'Trousers'
description: 'Trouser is an outer garment covering the lower half of the body from the waist to the ankles and divided into sections to cover each leg separately'

name: 'Skirt'
description: ' A skirt is the lower part of a dress or a separate outer garment that covers a person from the waist downwards.'

name: 'Outwear'
description: 'Outerwear is clothing and accessories worn outdoors
column4: or clothing designed to be worn outside other garments'

name: 'Hat'
description: ' Hat is a covering for the head usually having a shaped crown and brim'

name: 'Sandal'
description: 'type of footwear consisting of a sole secured to the foot by straps over the instep
